<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Popute fulfillment grp</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
gr.addEncodedQuery('name=SN-FI-AMER-O2C-Appro-BGL_SCA');
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
    var g = new GlideRecord('sc_task');
    g.addQuery('sys_id', '11c77748474bf510020ba9f8536d43b8');
    g.query();
    if (g.next()) {
        g.assignment_group = gr.sys_id;
		g.update();
    }


}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>Gokul Nath</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-12-07 05:33:17</sys_created_on>

        <sys_name>Popute fulfillment grp</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
